    • Constructor Detail

      • ProbeSet

        public ProbeSet(AbstractBone forBone,
                SegmentedArmature sa,
                double dampening)
        Experimental: Maintains a set of rotation axes and angles for the given bone, and the errors that the child effectors would incur from each rotation. These errors are then used to find a weighted average rotation which should in theory converge on the smallest rotation error.
